attributes.action: Leave the UNWEF and the WHO
attributes.additional_details:
The UNWEF and WHO are unelected bodies which are passing down edicts which pose a serious threat to our economy, the health a security of the nation, and humanity as a whole.

In a matter of a few short weeks we have seen food, energy, private transport, money and now even sex be attempted to be regulated by these organisations.  

These organisations pose a clear and present danger to the Nation and its people.  We must oppose them.
attributes.background: For the health of the nation and its people we must resign our membership of and commitments to these global governance bodies.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for aa similar action:

End the UK’s membership of the World Health Organisation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617450

We're not sure what you mean by "UNWEF". If you mean the World Economic Forum, the UK is not a member of this organisation.
